```{r daily}

rain_daily <- rain %>%
  mutate(date = as.Date(datetime_est)) %>%
  group_by(date) %>%
  summarise(daily_total_rain_cm = sum(rain_15min_cm)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  mutate(cumulative_rain_annual_cm = cumsum(daily_total_rain_cm))

write_csv(rain_daily, "~/GitHub/TEMPEST-1-porewater/processed data/TMP_rain_dailyavg_2022-2023.csv")
```
